isMongoNativeType

public static boolean isMongoNativeType(java.lang.Class clazz)
Check whether a type is a native mongo type that can be stored by the mongo driver without conversion.
Parameters:
clazz - The class to check.
Returns:
true if no conversion is required and the type can be stored natively.
